mapper.insert: insert into t_permission (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DESCRIPTION, IMAGEURL, PAGEURL, PARENTID, BREADID, PERMNAME, RANK, VISIABLE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breadid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visiable,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_permission set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGEURL = #{imageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGEURL = #{pageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREADID = #{breadid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERMNAME = #{permname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VISIABLE = #{visiable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DESCRIPTION, IMAGEURL, PAGEURL, PARENTID, BREADID, PERMNAME, RANK, VISIABLE from t_permission where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DESCRIPTION, IMAGEURL, PAGEURL, PARENTID, BREADID, PERMNAME, RANK, VISIABLE from t_permission
